Sentence.value: The Donath-Landsteiner test is a blood test to detect harmful antibodies related to a rare disorder called paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[Donath-Landsteiner test|C0200532]] is a [[blood test|C0018941]] to detect harmful [[antibodies|C0003241]] related to a [[rare disorder|C0678236]] called paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria.
